properties.name: spring.sleuth.async.enabled
properties.description: Enable instrumenting async related components so that the tracing information is passed between threads.

properties.name: spring.sleuth.feign.enabled
properties.description: Enable span information propagation when using Feign.

properties.name: spring.sleuth.feign.processor.enabled
properties.description: Enable post processor that wraps Feign Context in its tracing representations.

properties.name: spring.sleuth.zuul.enabled
properties.description: Enable span information propagation when using Zuul.

properties.name: spring.sleuth.grpc.enabled
properties.description: Enable span information propagation when using GRPC.

properties.name: spring.sleuth.redis.enabled
properties.description: Enable span information propagation when using Redis.
